description: TRU Precious Metals Corp. focuses on gold exploration activities in Central Newfoundland, Canada. Its flagship property is the Golden Rose project covering an area of 236 square kilometers located in the Central Newfoundland Gold Belt. The company was formerly known as Trius Investments Inc. and changed its name to TRU Precious Metals Corp. in October 2020. TRU Precious Metals Corp. was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Fredericton, Canada.
